actions.committee: House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce.

official_title: A bill to prohibit the Consumer Product Safety Commission from restricting the sale or manufacture of firearms' ammunition.

summary.text: Prohibits the Consumer Product Safety Commission from restricting the sale or manufacture of firearm ammunition or ammunition components, including blackpowder or gunpowder.

titles.title: A bill to prohibit the Consumer Product Safety Commission from restricting the sale or manufacture of firearms' ammunition.
